<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Hell Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=259)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A hell hound’s appearance dismisses any doubts as to its infernal origins—flesh the color of burning pitch, teeth as sharp as any fiend's pitchfork, and a shroud of ever-burning hell are are all trademark features.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/HellHound_HellHound.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Hell Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=259)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 205</row>

**Perception** +9; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); (can’t speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 40

**Immunities**
fire

**Weaknesses**
cold 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +13 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The hell hound breathes flames that deal 4d6 fire damage to all creatures in a 15-foot cone (DC 19 basic Reflex save). The hell hound can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. If the hell hound would take fire damage or be targeted by a fire effect, its Breath Weapon recharges.

</column>
